00097 /* actually hard coded endianness */
00098 #define GET_BIG_LONG(x) (((uchar *) (x))[0] << 24 | ((uchar *) (x))[1] << 16 | ((uchar *) (x))[2] << 8 | ((uchar *) (x))[3])
00099 #define GET_LITTLE_LONG(x) (((uchar *) (x))[3] << 24 | ((uchar *) (x))[2] << 16 | ((uchar *) (x))[1] << 8 | ((uchar *) (x))[0])
00100 #define SWAP_L(x) (((x << 24) & 0xff000000) | ((x << 8) & 0xff0000) | ((x >> 8) & 0xff00) | ((x >> 24) & 0xff))
00101 #define SWAP_S(x) (((x << 8) & 0xff00) | ((x >> 8) & 0xff))
00102 
00103 /* more endianness... should move to a separate file... */
00104 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN__
00105 #  define GET_ID GET_BIG_LONG
00106 #  define LITTLE_LONG SWAP_LONG
00107 #else
00108 #  define GET_ID GET_LITTLE_LONG
00109 #  define LITTLE_LONG ENDIAN_NOP
00110 #endif
00111 
00112 /* anim.curtype, runtime only */
00113 #define ANIM_NONE       0
00114 #define ANIM_SEQUENCE   (1 << 0)
00115 #define ANIM_MOVIE      (1 << 4)
00116 #define ANIM_AVI        (1 << 6)
00117 #define ANIM_QTIME      (1 << 7)
00118 #define ANIM_FFMPEG     (1 << 8)
00119 #define ANIM_REDCODE    (1 << 9)
00120 
00121 #define MAXNUMSTREAMS       50

00123 struct _AviMovie;
00124 struct anim_index;

00126 struct anim {
00127     int ib_flags;
00128     int curtype;
00129     int curposition;    /* index  0 = 1e,  1 = 2e, enz. */

00134

00139
